Config.TotalValue.Title: Show Total Value
Config.TotalValue.Description: Show a banner at the top of the shipping bin inventory with the total value of all items
Config.MiniTotalValue.Title: Show Total Value (Mini bin)
Config.MiniTotalValue.Description: Show the same banner as on the regular inventory in the mini shipping bin
Config.InvertScroll.Title: Invert Scroll Wheel
Config.InvertScroll.Description: Invert the direction of the scroll wheel when scrolling through the inventory
